title: Uncontrollable
detail_text: <:th_ch0004/>Shizuku, I’m sorry for all of the troubles that Honoka caused the other day<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Not at all! It seems that Ai-san made it a really big deal…. I’m sorry about that<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>I’ve had a clear talk with Honoka, so<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Both are at fault, so please don’t scold her that much<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>No, when you need to reprimand her, you have to do it wholeheartedly<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>That might be true, but….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>As such, I need to tell Ai the same things I’ve told Honoka. Shizuku, can you take me to where Ai is?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Eeh!? Ah, Umm…. Actually....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0004/>Actually what?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0203/>Ai-san invited Honoka-san again, “It’s revenge for the other day!”, or so she said and then she went out…. I can’t stop her at all…. I’m sorry....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
